summary: A successful businessman goes to Italy to arrange for the return of his tycoon-father's body only to discover dad died with his mistress of long standing.
cast: Jack Lemmon|Juliet Mills|Clive Revill|Edward Andrews|Gianfranco Barra|Franco Angrisano|Pippo Franco|Franco Acampora|Giselda Castrini|Raffaele Mottola|Lino Coletta|Harry Ray|Guidarino Guidi|Giacomo Rizzo|Antonino Faà di Bruno|Yanti Somer|Janet Agren|María Rosa Sclauzero|Melù Valente|Aldo Rendine|Bruno Alias|Sergio Bruni|Pasquale Campagnola|Lella Cattaneo|Nestore Cavaricci|Enrico Cesaretti|Armando De Martino|Giorgio Dolfin|Andrea Esterhazy|Ferruccio Fregonese|Ettore Geri|Armando Giovagnoli|Ty Hardin|Margherita Horowitz|Silvio Klein|Alba Maiolini|Giuseppe Marrocco|Anna Maria Perego|Luigi Scavran|Pupita Lea Scuderoni|Maria Tedeschi|Giuseppe Terranova|Bruno Tocci|Sandra Wolff|Lidia Zanussi
title: ¿Qué ocurrió entre mi padre y tu madre?
